long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the heart of the holiday season with a Christmas-themed live wallpaper for your browser! With this extension, each new tab brings you the warmth of a cozy Christmas atmosphere. Imagine snow gently falling outside a window adorned with twinkling lights, or the joyful spirit of Christmas decorations filling your screen. This extension turns your browser into a virtual winter wonderland, bringing the charm and magic of Christmas straight to your fingertips.

Beyond the festive visuals, this extension also packs practical features that make browsing even more enjoyable. You can access your most-loved websites with ease thanks to customizable site shortcuts. Need to search something? Use the Google search bar right from the new tab! Plus, the clock and date widget keep you on track while you celebrate the season. It‚Äôs the perfect combination of festive fun and functionality!

Transform your new tab into a festive holiday space, and keep the Christmas spirit alive all year long!
